        <path d="M484.279,31.219 C473.149,31.219 464.847,42.9 460.025,57.699 L460.025,34.56 L432.151,34.56 L432.151,38.728 C432.151,44.843 439.539,39.041 439.539,48.208 L439.539,125.697 C439.539,134.867 432.151,129.066 432.151,135.178 L432.151,139.348 L470.168,139.348 L470.168,135.178 C470.168,129.066 461.746,134.867 461.746,125.697 L461.746,87.992 C461.746,76.071 465.393,62.591 469.216,55.9 C470.731,53.252 472.016,51.667 474.044,51.667 C478.809,51.667 478.592,57.5 486.525,57.5 C493.638,57.5 498.349,52.018 498.349,44.15 C498.349,36.5 494.023,31.219 484.279,31.219" id="Fill-9">
        </path>
        <path d="M277.81,125.697 L277.81,34.558 L248.212,34.558 L248.212,38.73 C248.212,44.84 255.601,39.039 255.601,48.209 L255.601,115.213 C249.145,123.276 241.928,128.501 233.643,128.501 C223.066,128.501 220.125,122.964 220.125,111.727 L220.125,34.558 L190.53,34.558 L190.53,38.73 C190.53,44.84 197.918,39.039 197.918,48.209 L197.918,114.194 C197.918,132.629 207.302,142.403 227.332,142.403 C238.211,142.403 248.968,135.685 256.678,127.568 L256.678,139.348 L284.989,139.348 L284.989,135.178 C284.989,129.064 277.81,134.865 277.81,125.697" id="Fill-10">
        </path>
        <path d="M710.336,13.488 C710.336,20.866 704.353,26.848 696.976,26.848 C689.6,26.848 683.619,20.866 683.619,13.488 C683.619,6.11 689.6,0.128 696.976,0.128 C704.353,0.128 710.336,6.11 710.336,13.488" id="Fill-11">
        </path>
        <path d="M832.667,34.558 L832.667,125.697 C832.667,134.867 840.052,129.066 840.052,135.178 L840.052,139.348 L803.076,139.348 L803.076,135.178 C803.076,129.066 810.46,134.867 810.46,125.697 L810.46,48.209 C810.46,39.042 803.076,44.844 803.076,38.728 L803.076,34.558 L832.667,34.558" id="Fill-12">

        </path>
        <path d="M761.312,111.543 L775.912,62.767 C777.76,56.601 779.078,52.338 779.078,47.359 C779.078,39.721 772.303,43.995 772.303,40.284 L772.303,34.56 L800.594,34.56 L800.594,40.064 C800.594,43.883 795.768,39.811 793.636,46.269 L762.752,140.176 L749.299,140.176 L717.081,46.048 C715.133,40.349 710.563,45.254 710.563,37.664 L710.563,34.56 L748.534,34.56 L748.534,39.627 C748.534,44.645 741.989,40.155 741.989,46.048 C741.989,49.174 744.114,55.045 744.928,57.723 L761.312,111.543" id="Fill-14">
        </path>
        <path d="M559.962,34.558 L559.962,38.809 C559.962,43.397 565.812,39.72 565.812,46.047 C565.812,51.06 564.08,57.325 561.348,66.456 L547.401,113.063 L533.579,62.041 C531.515,54.419 530.19,50.088 530.19,45.613 C530.19,40.157 535.908,43.773 535.908,39.408 L535.908,34.558 L500.119,34.558 L500.119,38.933 C500.119,43.928 504.42,41.08 506,46.295 L536.088,145.768 C532.865,155.79 529.705,161.914 525.462,161.914 C518.553,161.914 521.959,150.033 510.066,150.033 C502.045,150.033 498.199,155.305 498.199,162.15 C498.199,171.35 506.104,176.999 516.698,176.999 C536.19,176.999 542.947,162.276 550.124,139.458 L579.499,46.074 C581.517,39.659 586.004,42.889 586.004,39.016 L586.004,34.558 L559.962,34.558" id="Fill-15">
        </path>
       </g>
      </g>
     </svg>
    </a>
   </h1>
   <a class="marquee-link" data-ga-call-to-action="media" data-ga-media-type="image" data-ga-ux-element="Spotlight" href="/food-drinks/g2251/st-patricks-day-recipes/">

    </div>

     <div class="marquee-content">
      <div class="cover-story-details">
       <div class="cover-story-hed-container">
        <h2 class="cover-story-hed">
         Serve Up an Irish Feast for St. Patrick's Day
        </h2>
       </div>
      </div>

    </div>
   </a>
  </header>

    <a class="sidepanel-footer-item" href="https://www.hearst.com/-/us-magazines-terms-of-use" target="_blank">
     Terms of Use

   </footer>

         <div class="custom-item winter-soup column-right">
          <div class="custom-item-inner">

        <div class="custom-item raising-chickens column-stacked">
         <div class="custom-item-inner">
          <a class="custom-item-image" data-vars-cta="CL Guide to Raising Chickens" data-vars-position="1" href="/life/kids-pets/a32102474/raising-chickens/">

          </span>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
    <div class="feed-block-container block-style- block-layout-image-right">
     <div class="feed-block feed-block-big-story feed-block-with-ad" data-block-template="big-story">

       <div class="breaker-ad-text">

      <div class="feed-block-column feed-block-column-right">
       <div class="feed-block-header">
        <h2 class="feed-block-column-heading">
         <span>
          Quotes
         </span>
        </h2>
       </div>
       <div class="feed-block-column-content" data-vars-block-curation="Curated" data-vars-block-id="cde91e67-d6ca-4320-9603-52f1cb983898" data-vars-block-slot="6" data-vars-block-type="3 Column Block">
        <div class="custom-item black-history-month-quotes image-left">
         <div class="custom-item-inner">
          <a class="custom-item-image custom-item-image-1x1" data-vars-cta="Quotes" data-vars-position="1" href="/life/g35410542/black-history-month-quotes/">

			l = d.createElement( "link" );

			l.href = Modernizr && Modernizr.mobile ? m[ i ] : f[ i ];

		}
	} );
} )( document, Modernizr );
